title: Jeremy Corbyn – 2022 Comments on Peoples Assembly March in London
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jeremy Corbyn, the Independent MP for North Islington, on Twitter on 5 November 2022.
content:
Today, thousands have mobilised on the streets to fight back against 12 years of cuts, division and destruction. We have wasted too much time already delaying transformative change. We cannot afford to waste any more.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
